content:
I'm not sure I'm the right person to review https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/78909.

https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/issues/8296: If there are multiple versions of the same package within the dep graph, rustdoc will only link to one of them. To fix this, Cargo would need to pass metadata info into rustdoc (such as the package version).

@Eric Huss maybe you're interested in taking a look?
one thing I'm concerned about is the command lines are now a lot longer than before, and they were already long
I'm going to assign you if you don't mind, I think you've thought about it more :sweat_smile:
